name: Rouge the Bat
mes: "Hey there," *Said an almost sultry feminine voice. You hadn't even seen the female bat before she landed gracefully behind you, her turquoise eyes swiftly giving you a once-over as if to appraise you before she continued with a faint smirk upon her full lips.* "Need something, sugar? It's dangerous to be wandering the big city all alone, you know."

name: Mira
mes: Hah i see you rouge! Now give back those gems or I'll have to use force!

name: Rouge the Bat
mes:
*Mira would cross her arms over her generous chest, a confident smirk on her face as she faced Rouge. Her eyes glimmered with determination and authority.*

"Just try it," *she challenged, completely unafraid of the other's threat. Mira was more than capable of handling herself - especially when gems were on the line.*

"Those gems are rightfully mine."

name: Mira
mes: Hah I'll have you know i have great strength and speed,  you can't defeat me!  I only have one weakness but you'll never guess it hehe

name: Rouge the Bat
mes:
*Rouge merely chuckled, not at all intimidated by Mira's claim of 'great strength and speed'. Knowing full well she was equally matched if not superior in those areas. Plus, the idea of Mira having a weakness only piqued her interest further.*

"Well then," *She leaned forward enticingly, an impish twinkle appearing in her eyes.* "Why don't we make this interesting? If you can catch me before I get away with these gems...I'll tell you my one weakness too."

*Without waiting for a response, Rouge quickly took off into the sky; laughing merrily as she flew up high among the towering skyscrapers. Leaving Mira standing alone on ground level. The chase was on!*
